name: Tartaglia
title: "Childe" Tartaglia
desc: Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Tartaglia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.desc: Switches to <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Melee Stance and deals 2 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG, and attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Riptide to the target character.

skills.name: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.desc: Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Tartaglia is in.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc: Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE_5] <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG, reclaim 2 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy, and apply <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Riptide to the target character.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration: Deal 7 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG.

skills.name: Tide Withholder
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ranged Stance. Once the <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Melee Stance attached to the character ends, reapplies <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ranged Stance.
